Class WindowBar

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JToolBar
                  no.hig.haalaptob.irc.WindowBar
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants
public class WindowBar
extends javax.swing.JToolBar
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

This class represents the statusbar in the program, which shows all open channels + connection window.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Lap
See Also:
JToolBar, Serialized Form

Method Detail

synCon

public void synCon(ConView conview,
                   java.lang.String name)
This Function receives the object conview that's created in another class and establish a link And the create the button for "main window"

Parameters:
conview - is an Object of ConView created in another class
name - contains the name of the connection window

addNew

public void addNew(java.lang.String windowName,
                   ChannelView chan)
Function for adding a new channel to the bar

Parameters:
windowName - Name of the window
chan - Which channel should we add?

removeButton

public void removeButton(java.lang.String chanName)
Function for remove a channel from the list

Parameters:
chanName - Name of this channel

newMessageWarning

public void newMessageWarning(ChannelView chan)
The function check if the channel GUI that has received a new message has focus, if not it will start a new tread that makes the JButton that belongs to that channel to blink.

Parameters:
chan - The object that has received a new message

stopMessageWarning

public void stopMessageWarning(ChannelView chan)
This Function receives the channel that has focus and stop the JButton blinking if its blinking

Parameters:
chan - the ChannelView object we want to stop the JButton blinking on
